trans_title: 极速前进 第三十八季
introduction: The Amazing Race 38 is the upcoming thirty-eighth season of the American reality competition show The Amazing Race. Hosted by Phil Keoghan, it will feature thirteen teams of two, each with a pre-existing relationship and including at least one former Big Brother houseguest, competing in a race around Europe to win US$1,000,000. Starting in Hoorn, teams traveled through the Netherlands, the Czech Republic, Croatia, Romania, and Italy before returning to the United States. Elements of the show that returned for this season include the international starting line.
chinese_title: 极速前进 第三十八季
